original_text: “Why have you not eaten the sin offering in the place of the sanctuary, since it is a thing most holy and has been given to you that you may bear the iniquity of the congregation, to make atonement for them before the Lord?
korean_text: 이 속죄제물은 지극히 거룩하거늘 너희가 어찌하여 거룩한 곳에서 먹지 아니하였느냐 이는 너희로 회중의 죄를 담당하여 그들을 위하여 여호와 앞에 속죄하게 하려고 너희에게 주신 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Why have you not eaten the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어찌 속죄 제물을 먹지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: in the place of the sanctuary
since it is a thing most holy
and has been given to you
that you may bear the iniquity of the congregation
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 회중의 죄악을 담당하게 하려 함이라
